definitions.definition: To communicate with a base etc, by telephone.
definitions.example: I was too unwell to work yesterday so I called in sick.

definitions.definition: To report; communicate (a message) by telephone or similar.
definitions.example: The hoaxer called in a bomb threat.
I'll call in this afternoon to pick up my prescription.

definitions.definition: To summon someone, especially for help or advice.
definitions.example: The government called in the army to deal with the riots.

definitions.definition: To withdraw something from sale or circulation.
